text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1070 in the Refurbished: Acer Predator Helios 500 PH517-51-72NU 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 16 GB Memory 256 GB PCIe NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Grade A Gaming is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The speakers is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Refurbished: Acer Predator Helios 500 PH517-51-72NU 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 16 GB Memory 256 GB PCIe NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Grade A Gaming!

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Starfield, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Refurbished: Acer Predator Helios 500 PH517-51-72NU 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 16 GB Memory 256 GB PCIe NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Grade A Gaming. The keyboard is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

The Refurbished: Acer Predator Helios 500 PH517-51-72NU 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 16 GB Memory 256 GB PCIe NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Grade A Gaming does what it says on the tin. Good for streaming games, but the build material could be better. Had a minor issue with bloatware, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the Refurbished: Acer Predator Helios 500 PH517-51-72NU 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 16 GB Memory 256 GB PCIe NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Grade A Gaming is solid, and the build material is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
